data.meta_description: Learn about Evan Rachel Wood on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Evan Rachel Wood, such as Frozen II, Thirteen and more.
data.text:
The Black Vera Wang

The White House staff responds to a warning of a terrorist attack, while frustrated C.J. deals with an inflexible Secret Service agent (Mark Harmon) assigned to protect her.

You Smell Like Dinner

Sookie adjusts to Bon Temp's new realities; Bill reveals pieces of his past; Eric crashes a witch's meeting; Jason gets his wounds licked; Andy struggles with his addiction; Sam learns of Luna's special talents; Jessica satisfies her blood cravings; Arlene witnesses strange behavior from her family.

Beyond Here Lies Nothin'

Maryann prepares for her ultimate bestial sacrifice; Sophie-Anne warns Eric; Hoyt gets sick of Maxine's insults; Sam must put his trust in an unlikely ally.

Frenzy

Bill seeks the advice of the vampire Queen of Louisiana; Sookie and Lafayette find it difficult to protect Tara; Sam turns to an unlikely source for assistance; Hoyt's allegiance to Maxine is put to the test.
